document_name: Act No. CLXVIII on handling weather-related and other natural risks affecting agricultural production
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/HUN/2011/HUN-2011-12-25-Act No. CLXVIII on handling weather-related and other natural risks affecting agricultural production_4b73435e4d000d6f58379a0223ff1a6f.pdf
document_description: This act requires government to establish a risk management system specifically for the agricultural sector. It also establishes a compensation scheme for loss and damage caused by disasters that affect agricultural production, creates an insurance scheme for agricultural producers, funded partially by government subsidies and partially by international aid.
